oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Jack Jones
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Jones, George R., Sr.; portraits; 1937 flood; Mississippi River; Tiptonville, Tennessee; 1930s;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: George R. "Jack" Jones, First Mate on the Army Corps of Engineers' Dredge Jadwin. This photograph was taken in February or March of 1937, when Mr. Jones was 20 years old. He served the Corps for 41 years and died in 1970.
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Gift of George R. "Jack" Jones, Jr.
